TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AudioAnalyzerPreset extends Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.Preset

Docs.summary: The Audio Analyzer preset applies a pre-defined set of AI-based analysis operations, including speech transcription. Currently, the preset supports processing of content with a single audio track.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AudioAnalyzerPreset class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string audioLanguage) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional audioLanguage As String = null)

Docs.param: The language for the audio payload in the input using the BCP-47 format of 'language tag-region' (e.g: 'en-US'). The list of supported languages are, 'en-US', 'en-GB', 'es-ES', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR', 'it-IT', 'ja-JP', 'pt-BR', 'zh-CN', 'de-DE', 'ar-EG', 'ru-RU', 'hi-IN'. If not specified, automatic language detection would be employed. This feature currently supports English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese. The automatic detection works best with audio recordings with clearly discernable speech. If automatic detection fails to find the language, transcription would fallback to English.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AudioAnalyzerPreset class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.AudioLanguage : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the language for the audio payload in the input using the BCP-47 format of 'language tag-region' (e.g: 'en-US'). The list of supported languages are, 'en-US', 'en-GB', 'es-ES', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR', 'it-IT', 'ja-JP', 'pt-BR', 'zh-CN', 'de-DE', 'ar-EG', 'ru-RU', 'hi-IN'. If not specified, automatic language detection would be employed. This feature currently supports English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese. The automatic detection works best with audio recordings with clearly discernable speech. If automatic detection fails to find the language, transcription would fallback to English.
